title: Mini-Ep 233: Grief Is Freaking Hard
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 233: Grief Is Freaking Hard
itunes:subtitle: Kate has a belated bone to pick with the world about microfiber hair towels, and Doree is drawn to a style called ‘stealth-leisure’. Then, listeners call in with their support for the caller whose best friend is dying, ask how to clear up counter clutt...
description:
Kate has a belated bone to pick with the world about microfiber hair towels, and Doree is drawn to a style called ‘stealth-leisure’. Then, listeners call in with their support for the caller whose best friend is dying, ask how to clear up counter clutter, and seek suggestions on how to reduce hair loss. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
